title: Total player salaries in the sports industry by league 2018/19
yAxis: Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars in each Sports League on the y axis.
The Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Sports League NFL and lowest at Sports League CFL.
The difference of Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Sports League is 4.9.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sports League in the x axis and Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars 4.94 is found at Sports League NFL and the minimum is found at CFL where Sports League is 0.04.

max_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars in each Sports League on the y axis.
The Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Sports League NFL and lowest at Sports League CFL.

The Sports League NFL has the highest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars, followed by MLB, and NBA. Down to the Sports League CFL which is the lowest.
The Sports League CFL has 3.78 times less Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars than average.
The Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars is 22.19 if we add up values of all Sports Leagues.
